title: Initiatives Domain Schema
description: Schema for high-level efforts aimed at achieving specific business outcomes, often involving multiple programs and projects

initiative.description: Represents the overarching goal or strategic effort that typically spans across several programs

title.description: The name or title of the Initiative

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Initiative entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Initiative within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Initiative

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Initiative is linked

driverType.description: Primary driver for this initiative, based on the SRM trigger catalogue.

rationale.description: Narrative explanation referencing this driver and the rationale for the initiative.

progressTracking.description: Tools and methods to monitor progress towards Initiative goals

resourceAllocation.description: Distribution and management of resources for Initiatives

dependencies.description: Other Initiatives, processes or systems that the Initiative depends on

relatedInitiatives.description: Initiatives that are related or linked to this Initiative

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the success and progress of the Initiative

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Initiative and its implementation

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Initiative can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Initiative aligns with the Organization's strategic goals and objectives

justification.description: Explanation of why the initiative is required, referencing business drivers, strategic goals, capability gaps, stakeholder needs, or regulatory obligations.

relatedStrategies.description: Strategies that are connected or aligned with the primary Strategy

childProgram.description: A specific Program that is part of a larger Initiative

program.description: Programs sit beneath initiatives and are collections of related projects

title.description: The name or title of the Program

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Program entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Program within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Program

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Program is linked

resources.description: Resources allocated for the Program implementation

timeline.description: The timeline for achieving the Program goals

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the success of the Program

dependencies.description: Other Programs, Initiatives or processes that the Program depends on

relatedPrograms.description: Programs that are related or linked to this Program

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Program and its implementation

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Program can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Program aligns with the Organization's strategic goals and objectives

parentInitiative.description: The parent Initiative to which this Program belongs

childProjects.description: Projects that are part of this Program

project.description: Projects are specific tasks or efforts at the base of the hierarchy

title.description: The name or title of the Project

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Project entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Project within the Program

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Project

organizationUnit.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Project is linked

resources.description: Resources allocated for the Project implementation

timeline.description: The timeline for completing the Project

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the success of the Project

dependencies.description: Other Projects, Initiatives or processes that the Project depends on

relatedProjects.description: Projects that are related or linked to this Project

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Project and its implementation

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Project can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Project aligns with the Organization's strategic goals and objectives

parentProgram.description: The parent Program to which this Project belongs

childProjects.description: Projects that are part of this Project
